Title: HTMX With ASP.NET Core
Description: With all the momentum behind frontend frameworks, it’s often easy to forget that server-side rendering (SSR) is a mature approach to delivering fast and reliable user experiences. Unfortunately, one of the most significant drawbacks to frontend development is the experience can vary wildly depending on factors beyond our control, with the client doing much of the heavy lifting building the experience for the users.

Title: Windows PowerShell Inventor Jeffrey Snover Interview by Evrone
